name: EuroHealthNet
membership: EU Platform for Action on Diet, Physical Activity and Health; European Innovation Partnership on Active and Healthy Ageing; Smoke Free Alliance Partnership; South-Eastern European Health Network (SEEHN); International Union for Health Promotion and Education (IUHPE); WHO Europe Non-State Actor; European Forum for Primary Care (EFPC); European Association of Schools of Public Health in Europe (ASPHER); European Public Health Association (EUPHA); European Public Health Alliance (EPHA); European Health Management Association (EHMA); European Alliance for Mental Health Work and Employment, Steering Board for Social Infrastructure Investment; EU Steering Group on Health Promotion, Disease Prevention and Management of Non-Communicable Diseases; EU Health Policy Platform; Centre for Global Health Inequalities Research (CHAIN)
goal: EuroHealthNet is a not-for-profit partnership of organisations, agencies and statutory bodies working on public health, disease prevention, promoting health, and reducing inequalities. Several research centres are also part of our partnership. We work on public health and social equity policy, practice, and research. We also explore and strengthen the links between them. Our approach focuses on health in all policies, reducing health inequalities gaps and gradients, working on determinants across the life course, and sustainability. Today, the EuroHealthNet partnership includes 61 members, associate members, and observers, coming from 24 EU Member States. They steer the work of the Brussels office through three collaborating platforms: Practice, Policy, and Research. A core team works to unite and amplify the platformsâ€™ work. The partnership is governed by the General Council, which comprises all partners, and the Executive Board.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: EU 2020 Strategy; European Pillar of Social Rights; EU Programme for Employment and Social Innovation; EU Health Programme; EU Action Plan on Childhood Obesity; EU Sustainable Development Strategy; European Structural and Investment Funds; Multi-annual Financial Framework; Health Inequalities; European Semester; Alliance for Investing in Children; Covenant on Demographic Change; EU Occupational Safety and Health Administration healthy workplaces campaign; 2030 climate & energy framework; Economics of Wellbeing; High-Level Taskforce on Social Infrastructure Investment; EU Green Deal; EU Beating cancer Plan; Digital Health; Future of Work; Annual Convention for Inclusive Growth; Research & Innovation
